packages.name: Tesla Powerwall Manager
packages.description: Create advanced Tesla Powerwall schedules, control, monitor, and integrate your Powerwall with Hubitat (and SmartThings).

packages.name: Demand Manager
packages.description: For those with utility companies that levy demand charges. Calculate current and projected demand usage for 30 or 60 minute demand cycles. Receive notifications and automatically control your thermostat and other devices in order to reduce peak demand costs.
